articles.content: TORONTO When the coronavirus sent the world into lockdown in the spring of 2020, the area surrounding Rogers Centre in the heart of downtown Toronto became something of a desolate wasteland. The fami… [+1101 chars]

articles.title: Citing injury, Djokovic withdraws from mixed doubles bronze medal match - NBC Olympics
articles.description: Novak Djokovic will not win a medal in Tokyo after withdrawing from the mixed doubles bronze medal match, his final chance.
articles.content: Australia's Ash Barty and John Peers were awarded the Tokyo Olympics mixed doubles bronze medal after the Serbian team of Novak Djokovic and Nina Stojanovic withdrew from their match, citing an injur… [+1011 chars]

articles.title: Matt Harvey extends his scoreless streak in Orioles' win - New York Post
articles.description: DETROIT — Matt Harvey extended his shutout streak to 18 1/3 innings, and Pedro Severino homered twice, leading the Baltimore Orioles to a 4-3 win over the Detroit Tigers on Friday night. Harvey (6-…
articles.content:
DETROIT Matt Harvey extended his shutout streak to 18 1/3 innings, and Pedro Severino homered twice, leading the Baltimore Orioles to a 4-3 win over the Detroit Tigers on Friday night.
